thread.title: Bikini clad Disha Patani sets the sea on fire with her hot yoga session – watch video
thread.title_full: Bikini clad Disha Patani sets the sea on fire with her hot yoga session – watch video

author: Rajat Tripathi
title: Bikini clad Disha Patani sets the sea on fire with her hot yoga session – watch video
text:
Kung Fu Yoga On the sets Photos 
Disha Patani is gearing up for the release of her International project Kung Fu Yoga with Jackie Chan. And she has developed quite an affinity towards yoga it seems. The actress has shared a video on her Instagram, which features her doing Yoga. Now, you would prefer a cozy yoga mat or grass for your yoga session, but not Disha. She picks the sea as the perfect spot for yoga. A bikini clad Disha doing yoga in water – now that is sure to turn up the hotness quotient of your weekend. 
Disha sports a black bikini, and loose hair, and does a surya namaskar in water. She captions the post, “Trying some yoga in water. effects of #kungfuyoga. releasing on 3 feb (sic)”. The video is going CRAZY viral on Instagram, and already has over 1.4 MILLION views. Whoa! Now that is something. This is not the only hot post she has shared in the past few days. About two weeks ago she shared a swimsuit picture of herself to wish her fans on New Year’s. Check out her hot video: A video posted by disha patani (@dishapatani) on Jan 6, 2017 at 9:06pm PST 
These two posts of Disha are not the only ones going viral, but also the gorgeous diva has made a hot debut on Dabboo Ratnani’s 2017 calendar. Joining the league of Alia Bhatt, Vidya Balan, Disha has posed topless for the famous calendar. Along with her, rumoured boyfriend Tiger Shroff also made a shirtless debut on Dabboo’s calendar. Also Read: From Shah Rukh Khan to Sunny Leone – here’s all that was HOT and NOT about Dabboo Ratnani calendar 2017 A photo posted by disha patani (@dishapatani) on Jan 1, 2017 at 8:09pm PST 
Disha, who made her acting debut in 2015 with the film M.S. Dhoni: The Untold Story, has said in an interview that she likes the whole aura about shooting on a set, and never thinks about failure and success. “I understand that you cannot always be on the top or be the best. It’s not in my mind right now. Maybe, I think it is too early. I am just a film old,” she said. A photo posted by disha patani (@dishapatani) on Jan 10, 2017 at 6:04pm PST 
Disha will be seen playing an archaeologist in Kung Fu Yoga , which will hit the screens on January 28.
